mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product_entity ( name, category, manufacturer, price, stock, description, file_path, file_name ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{category}, #{manufacturer}, #{price}, #{stock}, #{description}, #{filePath}, #{fileName} )
mapper.select: SELECT id, name, category, manufacturer, price, stock, file_path, file_name, updated_at FROM product_entity WHERE del_flg = '0' ORDER BY category ASC, id ASC
SELECT id, name, category, manufacturer, price, stock, description, file_path, file_name, updated_at FROM product_entity WHERE del_flg = '0' AND id =#{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE product_entity SET name = #{name}, category = #{category}, manufacturer = #{manufacturer}, price = #{price}, stock = #{stock}, description = #{description}, file_path = #{filePath}, file_name = #{fileName}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE product_entity SET del_flg = '1', updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id}
